text: The Son of the Sheik is a 1926 American romantic adventure drama movie directed by George Fitzmaurice and was based on the 1925 novel of the same name by Edith Maude Hall. It stars Rudolph Valentino (in his last movie), Vilma BÃ¡nky, George Fawcett, Montagu Love, Karl Dane, Bull Montana and is the sequel to the 1921 movie The Sheik. ==Other websites== * * Category:1926 drama movies Category:1926 romance movies Category:1920s adventure movies Category:1920s American romance movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American sequel movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by George Fitzmaurice
title: The Son of the Sheik
